    • i'm a passionate, eager electrical engineering student at the university of iowa graduating in december 2024.

      i'm currently looking for a full time job in printed circuit board design, whether it be in aerospace, defense, or commercial.

      some of my hobbies include playing video games, gardening, driving, learning japanese, keeping freshwater fish and shrimp, and electronics (to name a few).

      browse some of my projects below to learn more about them! if a page isn't finished, it's because i'm still working on it -- check back soon!

      if you want to get in contact with me, please email me at sam@samwitte.com and/or connect with me on linkedin!
